name: Odd One Out 5 Online Quiz | Mixed 10 Questions | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following does not belong?
questions.explanation:
Normandy.

	All the others are in Italy.

questions.text: Which of the following would Elizabeth Taylor consider the odd one out?
questions.explanation:
Stewart Granger.

	The rest have all been married to Elizabeth Taylor.

questions.text: One of the following does not belong. Which one?
Which of the following animals is the odd one out because it is NOT a rodent?
questions.explanation:
Fox.

	The other three are rodents.

questions.text: Of the following body parts one does not belong. Which one?
questions.explanation:
Tendons.

	The others carry blood throughout the body.

questions.text: Which of the following sports does not belong with the others as it does not use a bat?
questions.explanation:
Bowling.

	Bowling is primarily an individual sport, whereas the others are team sports.  Also, bowling is the only one of these four that does not use a bat.

questions.text: Other than color, name the odd one out of the following metals.
questions.explanation:
Uranium.

	The others are used in jewelry.

questions.text: Which of the following is not made from carbon?
Which of these following does not belong?
questions.explanation:
Atlantis.

	It is a mythical continent.

questions.text: Pick out the one that does not belong.
questions.explanation:
Concerto.

	A concerto does not contain singing.
